title: Brainstorm new MCP features to add
description:
Collect ideas for new MCP tools or improvements. Starting list:
- get_my_decklist (done)
- get_exile_zone (exile cards not currently exposed per-player)
- get_mana_pool (current available mana)
- get_combat_state (attackers/blockers during combat)
- get_card_count_summary (compact overview: cards in each zone)
- search_library (if tutoring effects need it)
- explain_stack (natural language description of stack resolution order)
